alert.note: Alert for Southwest Wyoming (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 22 at 9:53PM MST until November 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THURSDAY TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Wyoming. * WHEN...From 2 PM Thursday to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Roads, including Interstate 80, may be slick in spots due to slush, snow and drifted snow. Stay alert for changing road and weather conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Wyoming Department of Transportation, visit http://www.wyoroad.info or dial 511.
